item.title: NATS and Configuration Minions
item.description: Introduction Two blogs in one year. Who do I think I am? In all seriousness, thank you for all the feedback on the previous blog. As always, it really means a lot. This one might go a bit sideways, but building something like this has always been on my mind, and I got another spark to get it done while attending AutoCon2. I caught the first half of a talk by Mircea Ulinic from Digitial Ocean.
